lead_paragraph: The Kremlin warned on Friday that the appearance of about 300 American troops could threaten the tenuous cease-fire in the country’s southeast.

headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; Ukraine: Kremlin Issues Warning as U.S. Military Trainers Arrive
headline.main: U.S. Army Trainers Arrive in Ukraine

snippet: The Kremlin warned on Friday that the appearance of about 300 American troops could threaten the tenuous cease-fire in the country’s southeast.
abstract: Russian officials warn that presence of American military trainers in Ukraine could jeopardize fragile cease-fire between government troops and Russian-backed separatists in southeast of country.
